Il fait l’élevage des bœufs depuis 19 ans et il fait un bénéfice mensuel de 70000 F qui lui permet de survenir aux besoins de sa famille et la scolarisation de ses enfants. L’élevage lui permet aussi d’avoir du fumier pour son champ.
Il s’approvisionne dans les différents  marchés de sa zone et vend ses bœufs dans son village. Abel est très bien apprécié dans sa communauté par son courage et sa bravoure. 
Il rêve avoir plus d’argent pour acheter beaucoup des bœufs pour augmenter son bénéfice et espère acquérir un bon habitat pour sa famille.  
Les difficultés auxquelles il est confronté sont les maladies et mort des bœufs.
texts.en:
Biowé Abel is a 46-year-old farmer. He is the one holding the cattle’s rope in front of the group members. He lives in Mali with his wife and his five children, of whom four are in school. He has been raising cattle for nineteen years, and he makes a monthly profit of 70,000 francs enabling him to meet the needs of his family and cover the school fees for his children. Livestock farming also enables him to have manure for his field. 

He gets his supplies from different markets in his area and sells his cattle in his village. Abel is highly appreciated in his community for his courage and heroics. 

He dreams of have more money to purchase many more head of cattle, so as to increase his profit. He also hopes to acquire a nice place to live for his family. The difficulties with which he is confronted include illness and the death of his cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to sell

loans.name: Norma Yudis

texts.es:
Norma, de 30 años de edad, está soltera, estudió hasta noveno grado, vive en casa con sus padres y sus dos hermanas que están acompañados, en total son seis persona.

Norma, trabaja la agricultura, ella cultiva maíz y sorgo, a parte de eso cultiva sandia, sus dos hermanos le ayudan a cultivar 10,500 metros cuadrados.

Norma, solicita el préstamo para comprar abono, pesticida y para comprar una bomba rociador para el cultivo.

El sueño de la Norma, es poner un negocio en su casa, para generar mejores ingresos y así poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Norma is 30 years old, single, and went to school until the ninth grade. She lives at home with her parents and two sisters who have partners. There are six people all together.

Norma is a farmer and grows corn and sorghum. She also grows watermelon. Her two siblings help her farm 10,500 square meters.

Norma is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides, and a spray pump for the crops. 

Norma’s dream is to set up a home business, to generate more income so she can improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, and a spray pump for the crops.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La socia Martina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Martina still works in the food sales business, she's an enterprising woman who wants to use this job to get her kids through school. Her dream is to have a big restaurant. She's requesting a loan to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

She's happy about the loan and pledges to make all the payments.

loans.use: To purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

loans.name: Melchie

texts.en:
Melchie is thankful that she was granted a 12,000 PHP loan which she used to buy fabric, cloth, thread and other materials needed in her rag-making business. Through her earnings she is able to support her family and meet their daily basic needs, and send her children to school. 

She would now like to apply for a PHP 20,000 loan, which she will use to buy more fabric, cloth, thread and other materials needed in sewing rags to sell. Her round palm-sized rags are a major housekeeping and cleaning item use to clean kitchen counters, cabinets and smooth surfaces, and are replaced every week to ensure a bacteria-free cleaning rag. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her, for it will surely help cover her family's daily sustenance and fund her children's education.

Melchie aims to sustain her rag business but is also looking for other ways to improve her income to send her children to College. She prays that God will help them prosper physically and spiritually. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fabrics and thread for her rag making business, as well as accessories and herbal oil which she sells.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
As a parent of one child, Norma works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Norma is borrowing PHP 3,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Roxana Yanira

texts.es:
Roxana, ha utilizado el crédito anterior con responsabilidad para la venta de ropa y bisutería, su familia se mantiene y los ingresos que está generando con su negocio son básicamente de subsistencia.
Requiere de un nuevo crédito para comprar variedad de flores naturales como: rosas, claveles, etc., para las fechas de celebración del día de la madre, tendrá oportunidad de ofrecer un nuevo producto de temporada para generar ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Roxana used her previous loan responsibly to purchase clothing and jewelry, and her family has been provided for. The income that she generates with her business is basically for their livelihood. 

She is in need of a new loan to purchase a variety of natural flowers such as roses, carnations, etc. for Mother’s Day celebrations. She will have the opportunity to offer a new seasonal product to make extra income.

loans.use: to buy a variety of natural flowers such as roses, carnations, etc. for Mother’s Day celebrations.

loans.name: Maria Domitila

texts.es:
María, de 30 años de edad, tiene tres hijos, está acompañada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

María, se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa para niños y adultos, ella sale todos los dias a vender por toda la colonia donde ella reside y sus alrededores.

María, solicita el crédito para comprar más ropa y para colocar una venta de utencilios de cocinas como: platos, vasos, cucharas, tenedores entre otros.

El sueño de María, es construir una vivienda propia y colocar su propia tienda en su propia casa y asi mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old, has three kids, is in a relationship and her husband works in agriculture.

Maria works in her clothing sale business selling children's and adults' apparel. Every day she goes out to sell in the area where she lives, and in the surrounding areas.

Maria is applying for a loan to purchase more clothes and set up sales of kitchen utensils like: plates, glasses, spoons, and forks among other things.

Maria's dream is to build a house of her own and open up her store in her house, and thus improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes and set up sales of kitchen utensils like: plates, glasses, spoons, forks, and more.

loans.name: Parissin Group

texts.fr:
Julien est un cultivateur âgé de 42 ans. Il vit au Mali avec ses 9 enfants âgés de 20 à 01 an dont 5 sont scolarisés. C’est lui qui tient la corde du mouton devant les membres du groupe.
Depuis douze ans il fait l’élevage des moutons. Il aime l’élevage parce que ça lui permet d’avoir du fumier pour son agriculture et lui permet de prendre en charge les problèmes de sa famille.
Il s’approvisionne dans les villages voisins de son village et revend dans les marchés sa zone. Son bénéfice prévisionnel mensuel s’élève à 25000F.
Il souhaite acheter beaucoup de moutons pour augmenter son revenu pour satisfaire aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille et payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Les difficultés qu’il rencontre sont entre autres les confusions lors des ventes et souvent la mort des moutons et aussi la chute des prix sur le marché.
texts.en:
Julien is a 42-year-old farmer. He lives in Mali with his nine children, aged 1 to 20, of whom five are in school. Julien is the one holding the sheep’s rope in front of the group members. For twelve years, he has been raising sheep. He likes this work, since it enables him to have manure for his farming and to deal with family problems. 

He gets his supplies from villages neighboring his. He resells in market areas. His projected monthly profit is up to 25,000 francs. His wish is to purchase many more sheep to increase his income, so as to meet the everyday needs of his family and to cover his children’s schooling costs. 

The difficulties he encounters include confusion during sales and often the death of sheep, as well as drops in market prices.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to sell later

loans.name: Carlos Mauricio

texts.es: Carlos, tiene la edad  de 18 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos terneros para el engorde y que tengan buenas condiciones para que aumenten peso rapidamente y que se adapten bien a las condiciones de clima y topografía del suelo. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Carlos, tiene la edad  de 18 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos terneros para el engorde y que tengan buenas condiciones para que aumenten peso rapidamente y que se adapten bien a las condiciones de clima y topografía del suelo. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.

Carlos is 18 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings, who are his biggest priority. With this loan he intends to purchase some calves for fattening, calves in good condition so that they can gain weight quickly and adapt well to the climate and the topography of the land. With this purchase he'll be able to undertake another business, and at the same time have some savings that will allow him to have more animals and invest more in property. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He didn't get other loans previously from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has granted him a loan with easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To purchase calves for fattening.

location.town: Calle Mora Arriba de Río Nuevo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, for use on his farm. He hopes this will enable him to get more farm produce to sell and make more income to support his family.

loans.name: Taalaigul

texts.ru: Таалайгул успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она выражает свою благодарность и признательность всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Таалайгул имеется 2 коровы, 6 овец, 1 лошадь. На участке мерою 2,08 Га она выращивает арбузы и хлопок для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства Таалайгул составляет около 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений, клеенки для парника и обработку земли для выращивания экологически чистой продукции. Таалайгул является лидером группы "Жаз", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита Таалайгул планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, а также хочет приобрести автомобиль для ее семьи.
texts.en:
Taalaigul successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She expresses her gratitude and appreciation to everyone who helped to finance her. Today Taalaigul has two cows, six sheep, and a horse. She grows watermelon and cotton on a 2.08 hectare plot of land for use on her own farm and for sale. Taalaigul's monthly profit from the farm is about 30,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, she has applied once more to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds, fertilizer, and plastic for her greenhouse, and to treat her land to grow organic produce.

Taalaigul is the leader of the "Jhaz" group which besides her comprises another two people, making a total of three. Taalaigul plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business, and she also wants to acquire a car for her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and plastic for her greenhouse, and to treat her land in order to grow organic produce.

loans.name: Alba Iris

texts.es:
Alba, de 28 años de edad, es madre de familia de 2 pequeños, actualmente es empleada en una empresa atunera, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, juntos luchan cada día por salir adelante y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.

Alba, solicito el crédito para mejorar su vivienda, especificamente comprará; lámina, clavos, madera y teja; además pagará la mano de obra para la reconstrucción de su casa.

Su meta a futuro es seguir trabajando, luchando cada día por darles lo mejor a sus hijos y que no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Alba is 28 years old, a mother of two young children, and is currently employed at a tuna company. Her husband works in agriculture and together they strive every day to get ahead and provide the best for their children.

Alba applied for a loan to upgrade her home, specifically for purchasing: sheet metal, nails, wood, and tiles; and in addition pay for labor to rebuild her house.

Her goal for the future is to continue working, striving every day to provide the best for her children so that they don't lack for anything.

loans.use: para mejorar su vivienda, especificamente comprará; lámina, clavos, madera y teja.

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru: Нургул, 33 года, замужем, образование- высшее, воспитывает 3 детей. Нургул с 2001 года занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом. На сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы, 34 овцы, лошадь. На участке мерою 1,0 Га она выращивает огурцы, помидоры, рис. Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства Нургул составляет около 26,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений и клеенки для парника, чтобы иметь возможность выращивать органические овощи. Нургул является участником группы "Жаз", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Nurgul is 33 years old, married, has a higher education, and is raising three children. Nurgul has been in the agriculture business since 2001. Today she has three cows, 34 sheep, and a horse. She grows cucumbers, tomatoes, and rice on a one hectare plot of land. Nurgul's monthly profit from the business is about 26,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds, fertilizer and plastic sheeting for her greenhouse so that she can grow organic vegetables. Nurgul is a member of the "Jhaz" group which besides her comprises another two people, making a total of three. She plants to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and plastic sheeting for her greenhouse in order to grow organic vegetables.

loans.name: Sewesse Group

texts.fr:
Mathieu est celui qui tient les cordes des moutons sur la photo. Il a 31 ans marié et père d’une fille de 5 ans qui doit aller à l’école l’année prochaine. Sa femme est vendeuse de condiments.
Il réside au Mali ; étant analphabète il fait le commerce des moutons qui l’aide à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Depuis 13 ans il fait le commerce des moutons. Il a environ un bénéfice prévisionnel mensuel de 50000F.
Il rêve employer ce prêt dans le commerce des moutons  pour avoir plus de revenu et satisfaire aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille. Ainsi Mathieu espère aussi prendre soin de sa femme et de ses enfants. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés de sa zone et revend dans les mêmes marchés.
Les défis auxquels il est souvent confronté sont la chute des prix de bétail sur le marché  et aussi les pertes de bétails
texts.en:
Mathieu is the one holding the sheep’s rope in the photo. He is 31 years old and a married father of a 5-year-old girl, who must attend school next year. His wife is a vendor of condiments. Mathieu resides in Mali. An illiterate man, he does commerce in sheep. This helps him to meet the needs of his family. He has been doing this work for thirteen years. His projected monthly profit is about 50,000 francs.

He dreams of putting this loan to use in the commerce of sheep in order to have more income and to meet the day-to-day needs of his family. Thus, he hopes also to care for his wife and children. He gets his supplies from the markets in his area and make his sales at the same markets. 

The challenges to which he is often confronted include drops in the market price of animals and also the loss of animals.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to resell

loans.name: Jitahidi Self Help Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is Sabina, a member of Jitahidi Self-Help Group. She is 37 years old, married, and blessed with one child. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in June 2013.

Sabina operates a grocery business selling kale, cabbages, onions, and tomatoes. She is grateful to Hand in Hand Eastern Africa for developing an entrepreneur culture through training and mentorship. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to add stock to the grocery business. She hopes to get more profits that will enable her to support her family’s needs, such as education and food.

Sabina is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their support. She promises to repay the loan promptly

loans.use: to buy more stock of kale, cabbages, onions, and tomatoes for the grocery store; this will help boost sales and thus, profits.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, corrugated metal sheeting, and beams to be able to improve the hallway in his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails and wire to put a roof on his house.

loans.name: Virgen Inmaculada Concepcion De Pantorrilla Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION DE PANTORRILLA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Yanatile, provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Graciela  continua dedicándose al cultivo de frutas como plátanos entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua vendiendo sus frutas a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable, siendo de  esta manera que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la cultivo de hortalizas, cultivo de frutas, cultivo de cereales, tienda de abarrotes.
Al momento de tomar la foto una de las socias se volteo ya que la socia es tímida pero se compromete para la próxima foto salir bien.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Virgen Inmaculada Concepcion de Pantorrilla. The bank is located in the district of Yanatile, in the province of Calca, in the region of Cusco.

Graciela continues to make a living growing fruits, including bananas. She is grateful for the loan provided and she promises to meet the agreed repayments. She continues to sell her fruit to the customers that ask for it. She is a responsible person, and this is how she carries her family forward. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds. 

The other members make their livings cultivating vegetables, fruits, cereals and selling groceries.

When the photo was taken one of the members turned their head because they were shy, but they promised that the next photo will come out well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Fatmata G

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Fatmata G.  She is married, and has 5 children aged 21, 17, 12, 9 and 5 years, 3 are school going children. She has 2 additional dependents, who live with her to be fostered.  In 2005, Fatmata G established her textiles business - cotton, lace, gara (ink for tie dyeing) and materials etc. . Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about SLL 3,291,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. 

Fatmata G has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase bales of wax cotton, brilliant  materials, gara ink, lace etc.   In the future, Fatmata G plans to reinvest and improve her business, provide quality education for her children. She has acquired a shop and made prepayment for more stock as planned.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase bales of wax cotton, brilliant materials, gara ink (tie dye), lace etc.

loans.name: Gulzina

texts.ru: Гулзина, 24 года, замужем, образование- высшее, воспитывает 2 детей. Гулзина с 2010 года занимается сельским хозяйством. На сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 6 коров, 12 овец. На участке мерою 0,26 Га она выращивает  помидоры. Ежемесячная прибыль Гулзины составляет около 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений и вспашки земли, чтобы иметь возможность выращивать органические помидоры. Гулзина является участником группы "Жаз", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulzina is 24 years old, married, has a higher education, and is raising two children. Gulzina has been a farmer since 2010. Today she has six cows and twelve sheep. She grows tomatoes on a 0.26 hectare plot of land. Gulzina's monthly profit is about 11,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, she has applied to Bai Bushum Bank for a loan of 45,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds and fertilizer and to plow her land so she can grow organic tomatoes.

Gulzina is a member of the "Jhaz" group which besides her comprises another two people, making a total of three. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and to plow her land in order to grow organic tomatoes.

loans.name: Hugo Javier

texts.es:
Hugo, de 38 años de edad, es agricultor, es padre de familia de una niña de 6 años de edad, dejo la agricultura para dedicarse junto con su esposa a la compra y venta de verduras.

Hugo, solicito un crédito para comprar tomates, chiles, cebollas, apio, huisquil, zanahorias, papas, entre otros.

Hugo, sueña con ver su negocio estable, en un lugar donde no tenga que andar por las calles, mejorar su vivienda y por supuesto darle lo mejor a su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
Hugo, who is 38 years old, is a farmer. He is the father of a six-year-old girl. He left farming to buy and sell produce with his wife. 

Hugo requested a loan to buy tomatoes, chili peppers, onions, celery, chayote [a squash-like fruit], carrots, potatoes, etc.

Hugo’s dream is for his business to be stable, in a place where he doesn’t have to walk around the streets, so that he can improve his home and, of course, provide the best for his young daughter.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chili peppers, onions, celery, chayote [a squash-like fruit], carrots, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Luis Roberto

texts.es:
Luis de 26 años de edad, es un joven estudiante de la universidad, está soltero y vive con sus padres.

Luis se encuentra estudiando en la universidad, pues es alguien con muchos deseos de superación, además en sus tiempos libres trabaja ayudándole a una tía en un comedor y en  una tienda que ella posee.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar pollos de engorde pues ya tiene construida la granja y quiere iniciar por completo su negocio.

Luis es un joven soñador, es por eso que planea sacar adelante su granja y tener buena crianza de pollos.
texts.en:
Luis is 26 years old and is single and lives with his parents. He is studying at the university and has a strong desire to improve himself. In his free time he works helping his aunt at an eatery and at a store she owns. He needs the loan to buy broiler chickens as he already has built the chicken coop and wants to start his business completely. 

Luis is a young dreamer and it is because of that that he plans to be successful with his coop and in breeding chickens.

loans.use: to buy broiler chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease more land to plant more grass for the cows and increase milk production.

loans.name: Parissin Group

texts.fr:
SOBE EZEKIEL est un agriculteur âgé de Vingt-cinq ans vivant dans un petit village au Mali. C’est lui qui tient la charrue en bas de la photo. Il est client au RMCR Mali, président de son groupe. Il vit avec sa femme et leur fille de Trois ans.
Il fait l’agriculture depuis son jeune âge , et il l’aime parce qu’il y gagne sa vie.
Il n’a pas eu la chance d’aller loin dans les études c’est pourquoi il s’est lancé dans la culture des céréales. A cause de l’insuffisance de fond, il prend le prêt chez RMCR. Il rêve avoir plus d’argent pour acheter des bœufs de labour en vue d’augmenter le rendement de la culture des arachides.
Il s’approvisionne dans le marché local de sa zone et vend ses arachides dans le même marché où il fait un bénéfice prévisionnel de 280000f CFA par période. Il espère subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille et aussi envoyer sa fille à l’école. 
Les difficultés auxquelles il s’affronte sont la mauvaise pluviométrie et aussi le manque de moyens pour l’agriculture.
texts.en:
SOBE EZEKIEL is a 25-year-old farmer living in a small village in Mali. He is the one holding the plow  at the bottom of the photo. He is a client of RMCR Mali and the president of his group. He lives with his wife and their 3-year-old daughter. SOBE EZEKIEL has been farming since he was young. He loves it, since he earns his living from it. He did not have the chance to go far in his studies. This is why he got started in farming grains. 

Due to insufficient funds, he is taking out a loan at RMCR. He dreams of having more money to purchase oxen with the aim of increasing the yield from his peanut farming. He gets his supplies from the local market in his area. And he sells his peanuts at the same market, where his projected monthly profit is 280,000 francs CFA per planting. 

He hopes to meet his family’s day-to-day needs and also to send his daughter to school. The difficulties to which he is confronted include poor rainfall and also a lack of means for farming.

loans.use: to cultivate his peanut fields and then sell the harvest

loans.name: Parissin Group

texts.fr:
Barnabé est un agriculteur âgé de 33 ans. C’est lui qui tient la charrue. Il vit au Mali avec sa femme et  ses six enfants âgés de neuf à un an dont un scolarisé. Il est client au RMCR. IL se réjouit dans l’agriculture car il parvient à gagner sa vie avec la vente des arachides qu’il cultive pendant l’hivernage.
Comme il n’a pas assez de fond il a fait recours au RMCR. Son rêve est d’avoir plus d’argent pour augmenter la culture des arachides. Ainsi Barnabé espère prendre en charge les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux de sa zone. Et il vend en gros et en détail dans les mêmes marchés.
La mauvaise pluviométrie et l’insuffisance de matériels agricole sont les défis majeurs auxquels il se heurte.
texts.en:
Barnabé is a 33-year-old farmer. He is the one holding the plow. He lives in Mali with his wife and his six children, aged 1 to 9, of whom one is in school. Barnabé is a client of RMCR. He enjoys farming, since he manages to earn his living by selling peanuts, which he grows during the rainy season. 

Since he does not have enough funds, he has turned to RMCR. His dream is to have more money to increase his peanut farming. Thus, he hopes to cover his family’s day-to-day expenses and his children’s schooling costs. 

He gets his supplies from the local markets in his area. And he sells wholesale and retail at the same markets. Poor rainfall and the insufficient amount of farm equipment are the major challenges he runs up against.

loans.use: to cultivate his peanut fields and then sell the harvest

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: La señora Sara tiene 44 años está casada con el señor Remberto, tienen tres hijos de los cuales dos ya son independientes y uno de sus hijos a un depende de sus ingresos. La principal actividad que desarrolla la cliente es la producción de la leche cruda para su posterior elaboración de quesillo y distribución en los diferentes friales de su ramo, para ello cuenta con ganado lechero en su propia casa y sembradío. El destino del crédito es para la compra de forraje, específicamente chala verde, ya que es temporada de la cosecha del choclo y la cliente desea aprovechar y comprar la chala, comprara en grandes cantidades ya que desea acumular para que en tiempo de sequía no le falte comida para su ganado. La cantidad de litros que produce un ganado lechero depende de la calidad de alimentación que tiene, por lo que la señora Sara necesita seguir produciendo buena cantidad leche para ayudar con los gastos de la familia ya que el esposo trabaja para pagar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sara is 44 years old and is married to Mr. Remberto. They have three children, two of which are already independents and one of which is a dependent of their income. 

Sara’s main business is the production of raw milk for further processing of cheese and for distribution in different regions of her trade. For this, she has dairy cattle in her own home and field.  

The loan’s use is to buy fodder, specifically green corn husks, as it is corn-harvesting season. Sara wants to take advantage of the season and purchase the husks, which she will buy in large quantities to store up so that in the dry season she isn’t lacking food for her cattle. 

The number of liters a dairy cow produces depends upon the quality of the food it eats. Mrs. Sara needs to continue producing a large quantity of milk to help with the family’s household expenses as her husband works in order to pay for the construction of their home.

loans.use: to buy fodder to feed her cattle and save for the dry season, as it is corn harvesting season.

loans.name: Subainatu

texts.en:
This is 31 year-old Subainatu.  She is single, and has 1 child aged 3 years old. She has 1 additional dependent, who live with her to be fostered.  

In 2010, Subainatu established her essential drugs - syrups, soap, needle and syringe etc. business. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,200,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Subainatu has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase cartons of blood tonics, syrups, Panadol etc.. 

In the future, Subainatu plans to complete her building project, reinvest and expand her business. She increased her stock, bought a television set and refrigerator for cooling some injection drugs with the profit raised during the last loan.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of blood tonics, syrups, Panadol etc. for her pharmacy business

loans.name: Venancio

texts.en:
Venancio is married and he has a family. He is a farmer, a job that he learned with his father many years ago.  He needs a loan to buy a milking cow for his farm, to increase his milk sales.   Venancio hopes you can help him because his wife is unemployed, but she always helps him at the farm.

Venancio also works as a mason.  He is healthy and he hopes you can help him.  Venancio is in the picture and in the background  is her wife and his family

loans.use: to buy a milking cow to produce more milk for sale and support his family

loans.name: Las Mujeres Sabias De Pariachi Group

texts.es: El nuevo grupo “Las Mujeres Sabias de Pariachi” está conformado por 05 socios solidarios y responsables dispuestos a trabajar. Este es el caso de Jesús de 30 años de edad, soltero. Jesús se dedica al trabajo de albañil el cual lo realiza por contratos, le va bien gracias a su esfuerzo trata de mejorar su calidad de vida. Su mayor deseo es de tener su casa propia. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de maderas y cemento. El grupo “Las Mujeres Sabias de Pariachi” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el crédito brindado y se comprometen a trabajar bien. Jesús es el primero del lado derecho viste casaca de color negro con blanco.
texts.en:
The new group “Las Mujeres Sabias de Pariachi” ["The Wise Women of Pariachi"] is composed of five responsible members in solidarity, who are ready to work. 

Here is the situation of Jesús who is 30 years old. Jesús is a construction worker who works on contract. It is going well for him due to his hard work to improve his quality of life. His greatest wish is to have his own house. The loan he requested will be for buying wood and cement. 

The group “Las Mujeres Sabias de Pariachi” thanks the Kiva investors for the loan provided and they promise to work hard. Jesús is the first on the right wearing a black and white jacket.

loans.use: to buy wood and cement.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Anne: 34 years old, married, with one child. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2013 and acquired skills of enterprise development and financial management .

Anne has been doing poultry farming for the past 3 years. After the training by Hand in Hand Eastern Africa, she started a honey-and-fruit-selling business. The income from this venture has enabled her to provide her family with food and pay school fees for her children. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy more honey stock, since the demand for honey has gone high. She also wants to increase her source of income to continue supporting her family.

Anne appreciates Kiva and their lenders for the support and help and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy more honey that will help meet customers' rising demand.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia, tiene la edad  de 34 años, está en unión libre, vive con sus hijos y esposo,  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos cerdos para el engorde.  La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene y las buenas condiciones de un chiquero  para los cerdos. Además con la compra de estos cerdos de buena calidad que a corto plazo puedan estar gordos y de buena calidad. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar la actividad, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en el proyecto y a la vez darle más ingresos económicos a su familia.  Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Claudia is 34 years old and is in a relationship. She lives with her children and her partner, who are her greatest priority. With her loan she intends to buy pigs for fattening. Her idea is to make the most of the space that she has and a good quality pig pen for the pigs. The high quality pigs that she buys can be fattened up in a short while and will be of high quality. With this purchase she will be able to develop her business, and at the same time save some money that will allow her to buy more animals and invest more in the project. This will allow her to earn more economic income for her family. 

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She had not had loans from other state banks in the past, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with great support and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy fattening pigs

loans.name: Johan Ernesto

texts.es: Johan Ernesto, tiene la edad  de 21 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos terneros de buena raza y características para el engorde y que tengan buenas condiciones para que aumenten peso rapidamente y que se adapten bien a las condiciones de clima y topografía del suelo. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Johan Ernesto is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents and brothers who are his first priority. 

With his loan he plans to buy some calves for fattening that are a good breed with good traits. He wants calves that will gain weight rapidly and that will adapt well to the climate and the soil topography. This purchase will allow him to develop another business and at the same time save money so he can buy more animals and reinvest in his business.

It will be his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He has never had any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening.

loans.name: Turane

texts.en:
Turane is a 27 year old young married client. She is the mother of  2 children. Her husband is a butcher but his salary is not enough to cover the family needs.  For this reason Turana runs a poultry business. She earns money by selling eggs and chickens to regular customers and neighbors. 

She wants to grow her business and has applied to Aqroinvest for a 800 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) loan to buy more chickens to raise and sell for profit. She says great thanks to Kiva and all the lenders for aid.  In the future Turane  wants to own a poultry enterprise.

loans.use: to buy more chickens to raise and sell for profit and help support her family

loans.name: Edelma

texts.en:
Edelma is happy for the business she has now. She is engaged in direct selling cosmetics and ready-to-wear products. To make her income satisfy her needs, Edelma also engages in a vending business. While delivering her customers' orders of her direct selling business, Edelma vends meat and fish.

She needs to double her earnings since she has children who are in the college and high school levels of education. Edelma wishes for an additional capital of 12,000 PHP to buy meat and fish to sell. She will also use it to purchase lipstick, fragrances, and makeup to sell.

Edelma considers patience and hard work the keys for comfortable living.

loans.use: to buy meat and fish to sell.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 60 años de edad, vive solo en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará cuenta con buenas referencias laborales y personales en su distrito, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la destilación y comercialización de aguardiente, tiene una experiencia en el negocio de 13 años y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de mayor cantidad de caña de azúcar que es la materia prima para la elaboración de aguardiente y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia los que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos is 60 years old and lives alone in his own house in a rural area of Pucará. It is located in Jaen Province which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru. He has good work and personal references in his district. The people of the area are engaged in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.

Santos distills and sells aguardiente [a local, strong alcoholic beverage] and has 13 years of experience in this business. He has asked for a loan so he can buy larger quantities of sugar cane which is the raw material used in making aguardiente. This will allow him to generate more income for his family leading to an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of sugar cane which is the raw material for the  production of aguardiente.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a food vending in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Jenalyn dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Arlina

texts.en:
Arlina is 39 years old and has three children. Arlina is married and has two children who are in school.

Arlina is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Arlina requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Arlina has been in this business for 7 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Arlina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Brown

texts.en:
Brown lives in Hoima Uganda. He is aged 33, married with 7 children, of which 2 attend school. He runs a rice mill, alongside farming, mainly growing cassava, maize among other items. He hopes to expand his farming project by buying more land for farming and have a healthy family.  He may be challenged by the unpredictable weather changes. 

He is seeking for credit to buy more rice for milling and then to sell.

loans.use: to buy more rice for milling and then to sell.

loans.name: Santos Clarixsa

texts.es:
Santos de 37 años de edad, es maestra de educación básica, su esposo vive en EE.UU. ya que tuvo que emigrar hace un tiempo debido a la falta de oportunidades en el país, tiene un hijo y además con Santos vive su madre. 
Santos trabaja como profesora por turnos en el centro escolar de su comunidad, ella imparte clases a los niños de segundo grado de educación básica, además por las tardes se dedica a los oficios domésticos en el hogar y al cuido de su hija, anteriormente trabajó en la alcaldía ayudando en proyectos para el desarrollo de su comunidad.
Ella solicita este crédito para comprar arena, cemento, hierro y piedra para la construcción de un muro en el centro escolar donde trabaja, con ello podrá apoyar a sus alumnos a que se sientan seguros donde reciben clases.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando para seguir generando ingresos y mejorar su vivienda, y seguir ayudando a su hijo para que pueda terminar sus estudios y ser una persona de bien en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Santos, 37, is a primary school teacher. Her husband migrated to the U.S. some time ago in search of better opportunities. She has a son and she lives with her mother.

Santos works in shifts as a teacher for the local community school. She teaches second grade. In the evening, she does housework and takes care of her son. Previously, Santos worked at the City Hall helping with projects for community development.

Santos is requesting this loan to buy sand, cement, iron, and stone to build a wall in the school where she works. This will help the students feel safe where they receive their classes. Her dreams are to continue working in order to earn an income, to make some home improvements, and to continue supporting her son so he can finish his education and become a person of good character.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron, and stone to build a wall in the school where she works.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
The person in photo is Leah, aged 32 years, married, and blessed with one kid. She joined Hand in Hand in 2013 and received the training on enterprise and financial management as well as acquired skills on enterprise development and financial management. She is applying for a Kiva loan which she intends to use to start a business of selling second-hand clothes. She hopes for more income from her business and thus, that she will be in a position to provide for her family.

Leah is thankful to Kiva and its lenders for the financial support and she promises to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes that will boost her clothes-selling business thus generating income to provide for the family

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en:
Eyad is a 26-year-old single man who works as an accountant in a company.  He started a year ago working as a pianist in a restaurant to cover his needs and expenses. Eyad is very talented and playing the piano is his hobby.  He is an ambitious man who is trying his best to develop his business.

Today he is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy a new piano with special features, which will allow him to provide his customers' with more enjoyable music.

Eyad hopes to expand this business more in the future to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a new piano, with special features, so his listeners may enjoy his  music more.

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es:
El socio Eloy se dedica al trabajo en una institucion publica,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el socio por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el credito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eloy works for a public institution and his hours are from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. This work allows him to support his family. 

He is asking for a loan so that he can buy a television for his house. He is happy about the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a television for his home.

loans.name: Manzar

texts.en:
Manzar  is 38 years old. She is not married and lives with her parents in the Agcabadi region. She is a teacher at a local school in the village and her salary is 100 AZN.  But her salary not enough to cover her needs; for this reason Manzar sells home-use products.

Today, Manzar's situation is hard because she has a health problem. She is requesting a loan to pay for medical expenses and medicines so she can recover her health and continue her work. After treatment, she wants to take a loan to purchase a few more calves for breeding. She needs your financial support.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses and medicines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm in the hopes that this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell so that she will be able to improve her family's living standards

loans.name: Camilo

texts.es:
Camilo tiene 62 años de edad, vive con su familia en la zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, etc. Su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como patos, gallinas, pollos, entre otros. Esta inversión le permitirá tener una mayor variedad de animales y mayor productividad en su negocio, lo que tendrá una gran influencia en su nivel de ingresos y aumentará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Camilo, 62, lives with his family in the rural district of Oyotún located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The main activities undertaken by residents in this district include agriculture, raising livestock, and trade. 

Camilo earns his living breeding and selling animals including ducks, hens, roosters, and chickens. His business is located in his own home. He has over ten years of experience in this business with very good local personal and business references. 

He will use this loan to purchase animals such as ducks, hens, chickens, and others. This investment will give him a greater variety of animals and increase business productivity, which will have a major influence on his income to increase the quality of life for Camilo and his family.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and ducks

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Nelia is 46 years old and has three children who are in school.

Nelia has a food vending business in the Philippines. Nelia requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Nelia has been in this business for one year. In the future, Nelia would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Xiomara Karina

texts.es:
Xiomara de 32 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 8 años que estudia primer grado en la escuela de la comunidad, está casada y su esposo es albañil y agricultor, Xiomara estudió hasta octavo grado, no pudo continuar debido a que vivía solo con su madre y sus hermanos y tenía que trabajar.

Xiomara se dedica a la producción y venta de tortillas, además trabaja en casas realizando oficios domésticos, el trabajo lo aprendió de su madre desde pequeña y es lo que le ha servido para sacar adelante a su familia.

Ella necesita mucho este crédito para comprar cuatro sacos de maíz para elaborar tortillas, también ropa para su hijo e invertir en su hogar.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando y apoyar a su hijo para que logre ser profesional.
texts.en:
Xiomara is 32 and has an 8-year-old son studying in the first grade in their community’s school. She is married and her husband is a bricklayer and a farmer. Xiomara has an eighth grade education. She could not continue school because she lived with a single mother and had to work with her siblings.

Xiomara earns her living making and selling tortillas. She works at home doing housework as well. She learned how to do her work from her mother since her childhood. This work is what has helped her support her family.

Xiomara needs a loan to buy four sacks of corn to make tortillas. She will also buy clothes for her son and invest in their house. Her dream is to continue working and supporting her child to succeed and become a professional.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of corn to make tortillas

loans.name: Norie

texts.en:
Norie is a 34-year-old, married woman with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Norie has a tricycle passenger-transport business in the Philippines. Norie requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle.

Norie has been in this business for four years. In the future, Norie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es: Rodrigo, tiene la edad  de 34 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  de semilla de hortalizas de culantro, lechuga, mostaza y entre otras variedades de cultivos que se desarrollan en invernadero y a cielo abierto, y de buena calidad y que pueda tener una buena geminación y tambien la compra de fertilizantes orgánicos de y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de estos cultivos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual cosechar plantas ds buena calidad, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Rodrigo is 34 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children who are his highest priority. With this loan his intention is to purchase seeds of cilantro, lettuce, mustard greens and other varieties of crops that are grown in greenhouses and out in the open, and of good quality and able to germinate well. Also he would purchase organic fertilizers and other products to apply on his crop, in addition to hiring workers to apply those products and help with the farming once it's developed, and thus ensure that the job gets done well. His objective is to take advantage of the favorable climate conditions and soil that the area has for this crop, and also put to use the many years of experience he has in managing these crops. Also he would be able to buy the best products of the highest quality so that his farm can develop well and cleanly, as well as harvest high quality plants and have substantial production in the short term. He will use the income he hopes to receive from the harvest on his family's welfare and education, as well as take care of some family goals and continue to invest in the crops. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He didn't get other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant vegetables.

loans.name: Esenbubu

texts.ru: Эсенбубу, 59 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. Супруг и дети помогают по хозяйству. Живут одной большой дружной семьей. Каждый член семьи пытается внести свой вклад в развитие благоустройства семьи. Сама Эсенбубу пенсионер, у нее высшее образование. В качестве дохода для своей семьи она с 1993 года занимается животноводством, заготовкой и торговлей фасолью. Благодаря упорному труду Эсенбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 8 овец. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 7,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эсенбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Эсенбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также в будущем намерена приобрести автомобиль для ее семьи.
texts.en: Esenbubu is 59 years old, married, and the mother of four children. Her husband and children help her on the farm. They live as one big happy family. Each member of the family tries to make their own contribution to the improvement of the family's amenities. Esenbubu herself is a pensioner. She has a higher education. She has been rearing animals and gathering and selling beans since 1993 in order to earn income for her family. Thanks to her hard work, today Esenbubu has eight sheep. The gross monthly income is 7,800 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Esenbub has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy ten sheep to fatten up and subsequently resell at market for a higher price. Esenbubu plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her herd of livestock, and in the future she also intends to buy a car for her family.

loans.use: to buy ten sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
This is Jane. She is 32 years old, married, and lives with her husband and her four children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014 and has been through the enterprise development training. 

She does poultry and vegetable farming. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy poultry feeds and certified vegetable seeds. This will increase production of eggs and vegetables, hence more income to pay for her family's expenses. 

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to pay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy poultry feeds and certified vegetable seeds to increase production

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Paul, 35 years old, married and he has two children.
He has been running a motorcycle business and now wants to supplement his income. It is for this reason he is borrowing a Kiva loan so that he can open a new enterprise of selling vegetables and fruits. This will enable him earn more profits that will improve provision of basic needs such as food, proper shelter and taking good care of his family.

Paul is grateful to Kiva and its lenders and promises to repay promptly

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables that will help supplement income thus ease provision of basic needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue construction on a pen for her animals

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy oranges and other things.

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia is 59 years old, married, with one child who is 12 years old.

She is raising hogs for an income so she can help the needs of her family. She started this business two years ago. She plans to use her loan to buy hog feed and piglets. Bonifacia hopes that she will be able to produce healthy hogs that will attract buyers from the wet market at a good price in four months' time.

She plans to improve and increase the hogs that she is raising in the future so her business will be more stable. She and her family live in Badian, Cebu.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell in the market

loans.name: Olga Lydia

texts.es:
Olga, vive con sus padres y sus hijos, en casa propia, ella es madre soltera y ha tenido que trabajar muy duro para sacar a sus hijos adelante; se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, es una persona con mucha experiencia en el área, lo aprendió de sus padres, los cuales ya están ancianos, no representa problemas para continuar realizando sus actividades.
Necesita ayuda con un crédito para comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas y semilla para sembrar, otra parte será de utilidad para pagar la chapoda  del terreno y otros trabajos relacionados con su actividad, espera estar preparada para la próxima temporada de siembra y así obtener mejores cosechas, además podrá tener suficiente zacate para alimentar al ganado.
Sus planes son lograr aumentar la productividad de su negocio y así  almacenar granos para la alimentar a su familia y atender a nuevos clientes, de esa manera tendrá los ingresos para cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
Olga lives with her parents and her children in her own house. She is a single mother and has had to work very hard to get her children ahead. She works in agriculture, primarily growing corn. Olga is an individual with a lot of experience in this field, which she learned from her parents who are now elderly, but it doesn't pose a problem for her to continue with her activities.

Olga needs the help of another loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, and seeds for planting, to pay for the land to be cleared, and for other jobs related to her activity. She hopes to be ready for the next planting season and thus obtain better harvests. She will also have enough fodder to feed the livestock.

Olga's plans are to increase the productivity of her business so she can store grain to feed her family and to serve new customers. That way, she will have the income to pay back her loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, and seeds for planting, to pay for the land to be cleared, and for other jobs related to her activity.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, su pareja no trabaja y tiene 5 hijos que no viven con él.

Juan, es agricultor, cultiva sandia temporalmente, tiene 24 años de experiencia en este tipo de trabajo, decidió dedicarse a este trabajo por las ganancias que genera.

Juan, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para poder tener buenos cultivos.

El sueño de Juan, es tener un negocio estable y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 40 years old and studied up to the 6th grade. His life partner does not work, and he has five children that do not live with him. 

Juan is a farmer and grows watermelon in season. He has 24 years of experience in this type of work and decided to engage in this line of work because of the earnings it generates.  Juan needs the loan so he can buy agricultural supplies so he will have good crops. His dream is to have a stable business and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Antonia Licelena

texts.es:
Antonia, de 24 años de edad, está acompañada, vive junto a su compañero de vida, ella estudio hasta tercer grado, ella ya tiene tres hijos.

Antonia, tiene tres años de trabajar en una procesadora de camarones, de ahi obtiene el sustento diario para poder mantener a sus hijos y brindarles los alimentos necesarios.

Antonia, solicita el crédito para comprar lámina, madera, cemento y otros recursos para mejorar su vivienda.

El sueño de Antonia, es tener una mejor vivienda y darle la mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Antonia, 24, is in a relationship and lives together with her partner. She studied up until the third grade and she has three children. She has been working in a shrimp processing company for three years; there she earns a living to be able to support her children and provide them with the food they need.
 
Antonia is requesting this loan in order to buy corrugated metal sheets, wood, cement and other supplies to improve her home. Her dream is to have a better home and to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets, wood, cement and other supplies to improve her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and steel to build a wall to protect her house.

loans.name: Rufiji Group

texts.en:
Kidawa, who is in her late 30's, is single with three children that attend school.  She has been selling items, and operating as a food vendor for five years now.  She works from noon to 11pm daily and makes a good monthly profit.  

This will be Kidawa’s 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy sacks of Irish potatoes, tins of cooking oil, charcoal for cooking, and started selling cooked food.  She has repaid all of her loans successfully.  She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group.  

Kidawa used the profit to pay school fees, repay loans, purchase a plot of land, purchase a TV set, and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy Irish potatoes, cooking oil, cooking charcoal, rice, beans, meat, and flour to meet customer needs.  She dreams of building her own house.

Kidawa will share this loan with her loan group Rufiji which consists of three members that will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes, cooking oil, cooking charcoal, rice, beans, meat, and flour to meet customer needs.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 45 years old, married, and blessed with 5 children. She is a farmer and she grows cash crops for selling.

She will use the loan to buy dairy feed for her dairy cow as well as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm, and hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce for selling. She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children.

Her future hopes are to expand her farming and support her family.

loans.use: to buy feed for her dairy cow as well as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a 30-year-old married woman from Badian, Cebu, Philippines. She has been raising hogs for ten years now.

Marivic works hard to earn a living through hog raising. This business provides her the income that she needs for their expenses which include two sons ages ten and twelve.

Marivic is asking for a loan from CEVI to buy feed for the pigs that she is raising. She believes that if she will be provided support through loans, she will be able to improve her business to generate more revenue.

Marivic dreams of seeing her family experiencing a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy feed

loans.name: Benjamina

texts.en:
Benjamina lives in Badian, Cebu. She is 60 years old. For 11 years, she has used her sewing machine to make dresses to earn a living. She also sells ukay-ukay clothes (slightly used brand clothing sold at affordable prices). 

Benjamina is asking for a loan from Community Economic Ventures to buy cloth and more ukay-ukay clothes to increase her profits. The additional capital will boost her business income. Her profits will pay for food, water and electricity and also enable her to save.

loans.use: to buy cloth and more ukay-ukay (brand name used clothing) clothes

loans.name: Tunzala

texts.en:
Tunzala is 41 years old. She has two daughters and her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. She is a farmer, and her mother-in-law helps her with the farming. They have a farm and raise corn and other crops there. Tunzala has been working in this area for two years and has good experience, but her monthly income is low. This very low income doesn’t cover the family’s demands.

Farming has expanded much in Azerbaijan, and raising corn and crops is in high demand. People raise corn and sell the harvest to bakeries or local bazaars.

The farm’s productivity has fallen, and Tunzala can’t get the usual income from her sales. The family has a hard time and they need money to cover their demands. She has applied for a 440 AZN loan in order to supply the farm with good fertilizer and seeds.

loans.use: to supply her farm with good fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Nicat

texts.en:
Nicat is 28-year-old young client from Agcabadi. Nicat lives with his parents. He is a hardworking man with a great desire to progress in life.

He is one of the successful businessmen of his town. For more than 2 years he has been busy selling technology items. He sells computers, DVD discs, antennas, etc. He knows all aspects of his business very well. His brother also helps him with the business.

Nicat's father is ill and he is asking for a loan of 1,200 AZN to buy medicines. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy  medicines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides for use on his farm.

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is 36 years old and married with four children, with three children attending school.  Aileen works very hard to provide for her family.

Aileen has operated a general store in the Philippines for five years, selling a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, sugar, and other groceries.  She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell.

In the future Aileen would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Afsana

texts.en:
Afsana is 33 years old and not married. She lives with her parents in the Bilasuvar region. Afsana is an IDP (internally displaced person). She has been working in agriculture since she was very young and she loves this activity. Since she was born and raised in a village, she doesn't have a higher education and getting a decent job without an education is very difficult. But as she says, she is content with working the land and getting a harvest. 

At the moment though, she is having some financial difficulties, which is the reason why she has decided to turn to Aqroinvest CU LLC for financial support. Crop prices are very low right now, so Afsana cannot count on her earnings from her harvest to buy seeds toward a future harvest. For this reason, she has decided to take a loan to buy seeds. She is happy that there are such organizations that provide assistance to rural residents when they are facing difficult times.

loans.use: to buy seeds for a future harvest.

loans.name: El Molinito Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. luz Marina ella es conviviente y tiene 38 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de ferreteria.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "EL MOLINITO II" communal bank which is located in the Cusco district of the Cusco province in Cusco state. 

The member is Mrs. Luz Marina, who has a life-partner and 3 children. She owns a business selling food, in which she prepares different plates like roast chicken, soup and sautéed beef. She works from 8:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m and has been doing this job for 8 years now and it's going very well. Her dream is to have a restaurant. She is requesting the loan to buy cooking ingredients like rice, vegetables and chicken. 

The member whose photo is stuck onto the group photo had her photo taken after the meeting took place because she could't attend due to work commitments. The other members make a living selling sweets, clothes, groceries and hardware. 

The member is very thankful to those who are helping her make this dream come true through donating and she is committed to makes the payments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia Irma pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen Inmaculada Concepción de Anta” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia del Cusco.
La socia Irma  sigue con su negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continúa vendiendo su mercadería como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite entre otros.
texts.en:
Irma is an associate belonging to the communal bank “Virgen Inmaculada Concepción de Anta” [“Virgin Immaculate Conception of Anta”], part of the Arariwa Association of the province of Cusco. She is a responsible and diligent person.

The associate is continuing with her business selling basic goods and necessities. She continues to sell such merchandise as rice, sugar, milk, among others, for her customers that order them. She wishes to be able to continue working and thus keep supporting her family.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of rice, oil, and other products.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and other products.

loans.name: Mawethu

texts.en:
Mawethu is an energetic and ambitious father of two young girls.

After losing his job, he decided to go into business. He turned down a job offer and drew up a business plan. He identified an opportunity in the meat business and he plans to open a mini-meat wholesale business. He explains that he wants to supply meat and chicken products to small-enterprise customers who operate mobile butcheries in taxi ranks and around the township. 

He is requesting a loan to buy a scale that print receipts, two deep freezers, a cutting table and a mincer. This loan will help him start the business and meet an already rising demand.

loans.use: to buy a scale, two deep freezers, a cutting table and a mincer

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is a 33-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and three children.  Her husband has been running a tailoring shop in the local market for 5 years, and is solely responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.

Asma's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories such as pieces of cloth, lace, needles, and sewing machine accessories.  However, due to some financial constraints her husband is not in a suitable condition to buy these items for his business purposes. 

Therefore, Asma has applied for Kiva loan from the field partner BRAC Pakistan.  With the help of this loan amount she will financially assist her husband to purchase these tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs, allowing her husband to earn a more profitable income.

Asma is very thankful to KIVA and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy tailoring accessories for her husband's tailoring business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 49 years old, married, and supports a family of four members.  He has been operating a vegetable sales business in the market for the last nine years, earning 16,000 KES per month. 

Peter has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from Vision Fund Kenya to buy additional vegetables to sell in the market and increase income.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to open a retail shop in the area.  His future hopes and dreams include being financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in the market.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 38 years old with two children. Marlyn works very hard to provide for them.

Marlyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, candies, personal product care and other groceries.

Marlyn has been in this business for 5 years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Marlyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, candies, personal product care and other groceries

loans.name: Marie Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 51 year-old Marie Mohamed.  She is married, and has 4 children aged 21, 17, 14, and 9 years, all are school going children. She has 1 additional dependent, who lives with her to be fostered.  

In 2013, Marie Mohamed established her provisions, toiletries, batteries, milk, drinks etc business. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,200,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 6,000,000. Marie Mohamed has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase gallons of cooking oil, bags of sugar, cartons of milk, biscuit, crates of assorted drinks etc. In the future, Marie Mohamed still plans to increase her stock, educate her children to university level and the loan will help her achieve her goal.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase gallons of cooking oil, bags of sugar, cartons of milk, biscuits, crates of assorted drinks, etc.to expand her store

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 56 year old married man with 6 children living in Fort Portal Uganda, and has a business of tea farming. At the same time he distills waragi a local brew, in his village.

 He faces challenges of price changes and drought that reduce the quantity and quality of green leaf tea. Besides that, he has future hopes of finishing his permanent house. Peter has asked for a loan to  buy manure for his tea plantation.

loans.use: to buy manure for his tea plantation, to help protect against drought.

loans.name: Digna Gloris

texts.es:
Digna, se siente agradecida con Padecomsm  y a Kiva por el crédito que le confío anteriormente, pues así se ha mantenido trabajando en la elaboración de artesanías y generando los ingresos que tanto necesita para salir adelante con su grupo familiar.
Requiere de más capital para comprar nacazcol, arcilla, barro crudo y leña, fortalecerá su negocio con estos materiales para producir ollas, comales, sartenes, etc., espera tener mejores ganancias para que le den acceso a una mejor alimentación,  vestuario y salud para toda su familia.
texts.en:
Digna is grateful to Padecomsm and to Kiva for the loan they gave her previously. It has allowed her to continue her work making handicrafts and generating the income she needs so much to raise her family.

She needs additional funds to buy nacazcol [a black dye], clay and wood to strengthen her business. With these materials she makes pots, comales (skillets for making tortillas), pans, etc. She hopes to improve her income so that her whole family will have access to better food, clothing and health.

loans.use: to buy nacazcol [a black dye], clay, and wood to strengthen her pottery business.

loans.name: Rizwana

texts.en:
