She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 35,000 PKR to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently to a get boost in her earnings for expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently in order to get a boost in her earnings

loans.name: Shahzadi

texts.en: Shahzadi  is a happily married woman. Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a business of tailoring in her home as her husband's income was barely enough to meet their day-to-day expenses. Shahzadi  is popularly known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw material, she is facing difficulty in meeting daily expenses related to her business. Therefore, she has requested a loan of PKR 50000. With the requested loan, she wants  to purchase stitching material, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stitching material, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргизе 29 лет. Родилась в городе Турсунзаде. У нее среднее образование. Наргиза замужем и мать четверых детей. Ее муж занимается таксистом в городе. Наргиза швея. Она занимается этим более 7 лет. Ей очень нравится ее работа. Наргиза шьет с удовольствием. Она приветливая женщина и люди к ней тянутся. У нее много клиентов. Для дальнейшей работы ей нужна современная машина для шитья. Благодаря машине работа пойдет в гору, потому что новая технология работает намного лучше. Поэтому Наргиса просит Вас дать ей кредит значительную сумму для покупки швейной машины. Наргиза верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Nargiza is 29 and was born in the city of Tursun-zoda. She has a high school education and is a married mother of four. Her husband is a taxi driver in the city. Nargiza is a seamstress and has been sewing for over seven years. She really likes her work and is happy sewing. She is a friendly woman and people are drawn to her. She has many customers. In order to continue working she needs a modern sewing machine. A new sewing machine will really help her work to take off because the newer technology works much better. This is why Nargiza is asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine. She is counting on your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Aygun

texts.en:
Aygun is 34 years old. She is married and has two kids. Her husband earns for the family working as a laborer. The main source of income for the family is the growing of seasonal vegetables (onion, greens, etc.) by Aygun. She has been raising vegetables for nine years and has good skills in this area.

Greens and onions are very popular in Azerbaijan's national cuisine. They are used in cooking for kebabs, levengi, qutab, doghramajh and other dishes. That’s why these vegetables are in high demand. Aygun raises and then sells them at the local bazaar.

Her income for this small business doesn’t cover life's demands. Her harvest isn’t profitable enough and she plans to raise other vegetables and fruits additionally.  The cost of living in Azerbaijan is expensive; especially for IDP families. She applied for 1000 AZN in order to buy new good fertilizers and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new good fertilizers and expand her business.

loans.name: Irma Haydee

texts.es: Irma vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y ganado y también al cultivo de maíz, tiene 6 años de dedicarse a ese rubro que le genera buenas ganancias, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cerdos por mayor ya si poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Irma and her family live in a house of their own.  She has a business raising and selling cattle and pigs.  She also grows and sells maize.  She has operated the business for 6 years and says that it is profitable.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy pigs.  The investment will increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy pigs for her animal sales business.

loans.name: El Molino Group

texts.es:
La comunidad en donde viven las integrantes del grupo El Molino es muy tranquila, es de origen mazahua y sus habitantes se dedican al cultivo de maíz y a la cría de animales de corral. Es una zona mexiquense llena de festividades, por ejemplo el 25 de diciembre todas las personas creyentes acuden a misa para después convivir entre ellos. Cada familia lleva alimentos para compartir, algunos antojitos típicos de la región son los tamales, el mole verde y rojo, tacos dorados y tostadas, entre otros.
   Doña Nicolasa es conocida en su comunidad como Doña Nico y, aunque reservada, es muy trabajadora pues siempre ha buscado la manera de mejorar su calidad de vida. Está casada con el señor Alberto y juntos han formado una familia con cuatro hijos, de los cuáles sólo dos continúan estudiando, uno la secundaria y otro más la universidad. 
    En el momento en que Nico decidió formar su propia familia quiso ayudar con los gastos de su hogar, por lo tanto se inició en la cría de animales. Comenzó a cuidar borregos y durante mucho tiempo fue su actividad principal. Actualmente,  para complementar su actividad y aprovechar al máximo su experiencia decidió invertir capital solicitando un préstamo para comprar cerdos y alimento ya que sus conocidos le comentaron que este tipo de animales también son fáciles de criar y se venden aún más rápido que los borregos. Afortunadamente, Nico también obtiene algunos ingresos extra de la venta de pavos y pollos por lo que espera poder combinar muy bien el cuidado de todos los animales. 
   El sueño de Doña Nico es hacer crecer su negocio y que sus hijos terminen de estudiar una carrera profesional, "Para que ellos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida que nosotros" comentó. 
   Las integrantes del grupo son Lucia, María, Maximina quienes invertirán en becerros y Rosaura, en ropa. 

*La fotografía fue tomada en el jardín del municipio, Doña Nico es quien viste el suéter café*
texts.en:
The community where the members of the group El Molino [The Mill] live is very calm. It is of Mazahua origin, and its residents make a living by growing corn and raising farm animals. It is an area in the state of Mexico that is full of festivities. For example, on December 25th, all of the Catholics go to Mass and spend time together afterwards. Each family brings food to share. A few typical regional treats are tamales, green and red mole sauce, browned tacos, and tostadas, among others.

Nicolasa is known in her community as Doña Nico, and even though she is reserved, she is very hard-working. She has always searched for ways to improve her quality of life. She is married to Alberto, and together they have formed a family with four children. Only two of them are still in school, one in secondary school and another in college.

When Nico decided to start her own family, she wanted to help with household expenses, so she started raising animals. She started caring for lambs, and for a long time, that was her main occupation. Currently, to complement this and to take advantage of her experience to the greatest extent, she decided to invest capital, requesting a loan to buy pigs and feed. People who she knows told her that this type of animal is also easy to raise, and can be sold even faster than lambs. Luckily, Nico also has some extra income from turkey and chicken sales. She expects to be able to combine caring for all the animals very well.

Doña Nico's dream is to make her business grow. She also dreams that her children may complete their schooling for a professional career, "so that they can have a better quality of life than us," she says.

The members of the group are Lucia, María, and Maximina, who will invest in calves, and Rosaura, who will invest in clothing.

*The photo was taken in the city garden. Doña Nico is wearing the tan sweater.*

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

location.town: San Juan Jalpa, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more piglets for rearing so she can pay school fees

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y sus 5 hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad donde la vida es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una bodega ubicada en su propio domicilio donde vende arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, golosinas, entre otros productos. Cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, por su experiencia y su buena atención cuenta con bastante clientela de la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo utilizará en la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto el espera mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Javier is 36 years old. He lives with his wife and 5 children in a house they own in the Pomahuaca district. It is a community where life is calm, and the inhabitants work in farming, commerce, and the raising of animals. It is located in the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works in commerce; he has a small grocery store located right in his home, where he sells rice, sugar, noodles, oil, candy, and other products. He has over 15 years of experience in the area. Because of his experience and good customer service, he has a lot of customers from the area, who give him very good personal and professional references.

He will use the loan to buy a larger amount of merchandise in order to increase his business' stock. With this, he hopes to improve his income and therefore the quality of life of himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger amount of merchandise to increase his business' stock

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is a 47-year-old married mother of three children responsible of taking care of and raising alone. Her husband left them to travel I abroad to provide them with a better income.
Samia is a hard working woman, who started in 1987 to develop her hobby of decorating special occasion souvenirs into a successful business.  She runs her business from her house in order to take good care of her children at the same time.
Samia is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy newly 
 released decorations and special occassion themes to develop her business.
She hopes to stay capable of providing her customers with special handmade items that attract their attention.

loans.use: To buy newly released decorations and special occassion themes to develop her business

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es:
José, considera que tiene muy buenos resultados al invertir créditos en su negocio, por lo que ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar repuestos que necesita para la máquina de lavar vehículos, tendrá en óptimas condiciones su equipo para seguir sirviendo a sus clientes de la mejor manera.
La inversión anterior fue de mucha importancia para equipar su negocio, permitiéndole así atender de inmediato a sus clientes y generar mejores ingresos con los que cancelo su deuda y cubre gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Jose is applying for a loan that he will use to buy replacement parts for the equipment he needs to run his car washing business.  He has been able to use past loans to support the business, he says, and expects this investment to help him meet the level of service that his customers demand.  His last loan allowed him to buy equipment he needed for the business and he was able to use the profits to pay off the loan and cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for the equipment he needs to run his business.

loans.name: Rosa Evangelina

texts.es:
Rosa, de 25 años de edad, está acompañada, vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos; su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, mientras que el mayor de sus hijos está estudiando; Rosa, estudio hasta tercer grado de educación básica, ya que sus padres no pudieron seguir ayudándole, debido a los escasos recursos económicos en los que vivían.
	
Rosa, se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura, fue con su compañero de vida que aprendió este trabajo y desde hace 8 años lo ejerce; anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de tamales con su madre, ahora el horario de trabajo de Rosa, es de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 11:00 de la mañana todos los días de la semana.

Rosa, necesita el crédito para comprar foliares y abono para los cultivos de sandía que tiene, ya que son una parte indispensable para la producción, esto mejorara la producción de sandía.

Rosa, sueña con tener 14,000 metros cuadrados de tierra para cultivar más, ella sabe que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación algún día lo logrará, también sueña con sus dos pequeños hijos lleguen a ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa, who is 25 years old, is in a relationship and lives with her partner and their two children. Her partner works in agriculture, and the older of her children is in school. Rosa studied until the third grade of elementary school, since her parents could not continue supporting her, due to their economic condition.

Rosa makes a living in agriculture. It was from her partner that she learned this work and has done it for the past 8 years; previously she worked selling tamales with her mother. Now Rosa's work schedule is from 6:00 a.m. until 11:00 in the morning every day of the week.
	
Rosa, needs the loan to buy fertilizer for her watermelon crop, since it is an indispensable part of production. This will improve the production of watermelon.

Rosa dreams of having 14,000 square meters of land to grow more. She knows that with more effort and dedication that one day she will achieve this. She also dreams that her young children will become professionals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the watermelon crop she has

loans.name: Fredis  Alberto

texts.es: Fredis de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto y también al cultivo de maíz, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a ese rubro que le genera buenas ganancias sus hijos mayores le ayudan en la siembra y la crianza, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas de mas ganado ya si poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Fredis, 47, and his four children live in a house of their own.  He makes a living farming maize and raising cattle.  He has operated the business for 15 years and says that it is profitable.  His grown children help him with the business.  Fredis is applying for a loan that he will use to buy more cattle.  The investment will help him to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy more cattle.

loans.name: Diluvina

texts.es:
La señora Diluvina  de 34 años de edad, vive con su esposo y  tiene 1 hijo que dependen de ambos, vive en casa propia en una comunidad  de San Lorenzo Valle al sur de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 05  años  al negocio de la venta de verduras y frutas.
Doña Diluvina vende sandias, plátano, cebolla, papas, tomates, chiles, pataste, zanahoria, manzanas, uvas, melón,  etc. en esta ocasión esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de laminas de zinc, canaletas y cemento porque quiere mejorar el techo de su casa.
Doña Diluvina con el apoyo de este préstamo espera mejorar su casa y por ende su calidad de vida.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
Diluvina, 34, lives with her husband and has one dependent child.  She lives in her own house in a community in San Lorenzo Valle, in the south of Honduras.  She has worked for five years in her business selling fruits and vegetables.

Diluvina sells watermelon, bananas, onions, potatoes, tomatoes, chili peppers, carrots, apples, grapes, cantaloupe, and so on.  Currently she's requesting the loan to buy metal roofing, gutters, and cement because she wants to improve the roof of her house.

Dilivina hopes to improve her house and, as a result, her quality of life with this loan.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, May 2015

loans.use: to buy metal roofing, gutters, and cement for her house

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos de 33 años de edad, estudió hasta 4º grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja vendiendo verduras de casa en casa, tiene dos hijos que ya estudian en la escuela.


Carlos se dedica a la venta de pan, él sale en bicicleta a los pueblos cercanos para vender la mercadería, decidió dedicarse a esto por la necesidad de ayudar a su familia, el trabajo lo realiza de lunes a viernes y el fin de semana realiza otras actividades.


Él necesita mucho de este préstamo para cancelar un crédito que tiene en otra institución y para comprar más pan para ir a vender.

Su sueño es tener varios ayudantes para repartir el pan y en un futuro tener su propia panadería.
texts.en:
Carlos, who is 33 years old, went to school through 4th grade. He is married, and his wife works selling vegetables door to door. He has two children who are already in school.

Carlos works in selling bread. He goes by bicycle to the nearby towns to sell his merchandise. He decided to do this because of the need to help his family. He does the work from Monday to Friday, and on the weekend he does other work.

He very much needs this loan to pay off a loan that he has with another institution and to buy more bread to sell.

His dream is to have a number of assistants to distribute the bread and in the future to have his own bakery.

loans.use: to pay off a loan that he has with another institution and to purchase more bread to sell

loans.name: Sonkondin Group

texts.fr:
Mme RASMATA est responsable du groupe SONKONDIN. Mariée, elle est mère 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 13 ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 03 vont à l’école.
Elle fait du jardinage depuis 03 ans. Elle s’approvisionne les marchands ambulant.
Mme veut s’acheter 06 boites d'insecticides et 04 sac d’engrais.
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour améliorer son activité. Mme ambitionne aider ses enfants pour qu'ils aillent loin dans leurs études.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rasmata is the leader of the Sonkondin group. She is married and has five children ranging from two to 13 years of age. Three of her children attend school.

Rasmata has been growing garden vegetables for three years. She stocks up from street vendor. She would like to buy six boxes of insecticide and four bags of fertilizer. Ramsata plans to use her revenues to improve her business. Her goal is to help her children advance in their studies.

loans.use: to buy six boxes of insecticide and four bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Rosmeri

texts.es: La Señora Rosmeri es madre soltera, tiene un hijo dependiente que todavía no estudia. Se dedica a la actividad de agricultura conjuntamente con su familia (que le ayudan en los trabajos que requieren mayor fuerza), produciendo papaliza y oca como los principales productos agrícolas de mayor demanda en el mercado. Los ingresos económicos los obtiene a través de la producción y venta de papa y oca que son también el sustento para su alimentación (autoconsumo). La Señora Rosmeri requiere el financiamiento para la compra de 0,5 Ha. de terreno agrícola para cultivo de Papaliza, con esta compra de terreno agrícola incrementará la producción y tendrá mayores ventas que mejorarán su nivel de vida y su situación social en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Rosmeri is a single mother, with a dependent child who is not yet in school. She works in agriculture, along with her family (who helps her with the jobs that require more strength). 

She produces papaliza and oca [two root vegetables], which are the principal agricultural products most in demand in the market.  She earns an income by producing papaliza and oca, which are also the source of food for her personal consumption. 

Señora Rosmeri needs the loan for the purchase of 0.5 hectares [about 1.25 acres] of farmland, in order to cultivate papaliza.  With this purchase of farmland, she will increase production and have better sales, which will improve her standard of living and her social standing, to the benefit of her family.

loans.use: to purchase 1.25 acres of farmland to cultivate papaliza [a root vegetable], in order to increase her production and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.name: Sergio Andrés

texts.es: Sergio es un joven emprendedor de 21 años que aprendió a elaborar artesanías luego que su cuñado quien tiene mucha experiencia en este arte lo capacitara.  Hoy en día cuenta con dos años distribuyendo collares, pulseras y llaveros en almacenes ubicados en Cartagena y Santa Marta, donde existe gran afluencia de visitantes por ser destinos turísticos de la Región caribe Colombiana, en donde llevarse un recuerdo de estas tierras es irresistible.  Sergio es muy comprometido con su negocio, todos los días muy temprano desde la comodidad de su hogar ubicado en un barrio del sur occidente de Barranquilla, comienza a elaborar sus artesanías para cumplir oportunamente con la entrega de sus pedidos,  actualmente está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar materiales para la elaboración de sus collares; hilo terlenca, herrajes y silicona.  Con esta inversión pretende surtir a sus clientes con nuevos diseños e incrementar sus ventas. Sergio es padre de una niña de tres años de edad a quien desea ofrecer bienestar, su compromiso familiar es cumplir con la meta de adquirir una casa para su familia y en su negocio desea a futuro tener un almacén de artesanías en Santa Marta.
texts.en:
Sergio is a young entrepreneur who is 21 years old. He learned how to make handicrafts from his brother-in-law who is very experienced in this art.

Today he has two years of experience distributing necklaces, bracelets and key rings to stores in Cartagena and Santa Marta where many affluent tourists go when visiting the Colombian Caribbean region. They find it irresistible to take home a souvenir of their visit to the area. Sergio is very dedicated to his business. He begins to make his handicrafts very early each day so he can fulfill his orders in a timely manner.  He does this from the comfort of his home which is located in  a neighborhood in the southwestern part of Barranquilla. 

He is currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first one with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, so he can buy materials to make his necklaces such as Terlenka cord, fittings and silicone. With this investment he intends to provide his clients with new designs and increase his sales. 

Sergio wants to provide a sense of well being to his three-year-old daughter. His commitment to his family is to meet the goal of home ownership, and for his business he hopes to have a handicrafts store in Santa Marta in the future.

loans.use: to buy materials to make his necklaces: Terlenka cord, fittings and silicone.

loans.name: Zokirjon

texts.ru:
Зокирчон мастер города Турсунзаде. Он производит пластиковые двери и окна. Зокирчон  5 лет назад начал своя деятельность. Его научил отец. Его отец хотел, чтобы Зокирчон продвигал свою деятельность. Теперь Зокирчон идет по стопам отца.  Зокирчон уже научился на отлично и хорошо справляется со своей работой. Он уже привык на свою работу, и решил заняться еще много лет. 
Зокирчон семейный человек. У него красивая жена и 4 прекрасные дети. Дети еще маленькие. Зокирчон любить свою семью и старается улучшить их жилищные условия. Он хочет улучшить и расширить свою работу. Ему надо купить инструменты  и оборудования для производство пластиковые двери и окна.  Зокирчон по этой причине обратился к Вам за кредитом. Он верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Zokirjon is a tradesman in the town of Tursun-zoda. He manufactures plastic doors and windows. He launched his business five years ago. He learned this trade from his father, who wished for Zokirjon to have his own business. Now Zokirjon is following in his father's footsteps. He masters his trade perfectly and  keeps up with his work. He has gotten used to this line of business and wants to continue his work for many years.

Zokirjon is a family man. He has  a beautiful wife and four wonderful children. His children are still very young. Zokirjon loves his family and tries to improve its quality of life. He would like to improve and expand his business. He needs to buy tools and supplies to manufacture plastic doors and windows. This is why Zokirjon is asking you for a loan. He puts his trust in you and your support.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies to manufacture plastic doors and windows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, stones, gravel, metal sheet and twine to construct a hallway in her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy the construction materials he needs to build a concrete floor and guard his house against mosquito-borne illnesses.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Don Felipe de 52 años d edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, su hijo y su nieto, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, tiene 25 años de dedicarse esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con las ventas es como logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. asi como muestra la fotografia y asi poder continuar con su trabajo asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Felipe is 52 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife, his son, and his grandson.

He earns a living growing maize and beans. He has been following this occupation for 25 years. He sells his products in the vicinity of the area where he lives. With his sales, he manages to do all right for himself.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, inorganic and organic fertilizers, and the like—see the photo. In this way, he will be able to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, inorganic and organic fertilizers, and the like.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia Victoria  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de chicha y tambien al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar jora para preparar la chicha.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Victoria continues to work in the sale of chicha and also the business of animal raising. She sells from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, has been in this business for several years and is doing well. This group member's dream is to have a restaurant. She's applying for a loan to purchase corn for making chicha. 

This group member is happy for the loan and commits herself to making the payments.

loans.use: To purchase corn to make chicha.

loans.name: Jose Eleuterio

texts.en:
José grows basic grains and raises pigs and cattle. He learned this work when he was very young, since his parents taught it to him. Now he does it as a way to have economic income to be able to meet his obligations. His work schedule is from seven in the morning to three in the afternoon.

He wants to invest in the supplies for his business, and so he will buy pigs and agricultural supplies. He will increase the number of animals [he has] and give good treatment to his crops. He is thinking of using the rest of the loan to pay for the preparation of land, such as weed control, planting, and other activities that this business involves.

His dreams are to have better crops from his plantings and in this way to have the possibility of a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and agricultural supplies to increase the number of animals and give good treatment to his crops

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La  socia Francisca se dedica al  negocio de venta y crianza de animales y también la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia es una mujer trabajadora por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Group member Francisca works in the business of raising and selling animals and also raises guinea pigs and chickens. She makes them bigger and fattens them and then sells them at different fairs. This group member is a hardworking woman and wants to get her family ahead through this business. She's requesting a loan to purchase guinea pigs and chickens and feed for those guinea pigs and chickens. This group member is happy for the loan and commits herself to making the payments.

loans.use: To purchase guinea pigs and chickens and feed for guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Jaime Ernesto

texts.es:
Jaime, de 26 años de edad, estudió hasta primer año de bachillerato, vive solo con sus abuelos, está soltero.
	
Jaime, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 5 años, anteriormente trabajaba como jornalero, pero luego decidió trabajar para sí mismo; un día el estado le regalo una parcela de tierra para poder trabajar en ella.

Jaime, solicita el préstamo para comprar foliare, abono y agua para poder regar su cultivo cuando no llueva; es por eso que solicita el crédito para que su cultivo sea bueno y así obtener un buen ingreso.

El sueño de Jaime, es tener la mejor cosecha posible del año y en su vida personal encontrar a la mujer con la que compartirá toda su vida.
texts.en:
26-year-old Jaime went to school until the first year of high school. He lives with his grandparents; he is single.

Jaime has made a living by farming for the past 5 years. Before that, he worked as a day laborer, but he later decided to be his own boss. One day the state gave him a parcel of land, so that he could work on it.

Jaime is requesting a loan to purchase foliar spray, fertilizer, and water to irrigate his plants when it doesn't rain. He is asking for the loan so that his crops will be good and he can receive a good income.

Jaime's dream is to have the best possible harvest of the year, and in his personal life, to find the woman with whom he will share the rest of his life.

loans.use: to purchase foliar spray, fertilizer, and water to irrigate his plants when it doesn't rain

loans.name: Luz  Altagracia

texts.es: Luz de 36 años d edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de dedicarse esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside y con las ventas es como logra salir adelante, luz esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. asi como muestra en la fotografia y asi poder continuar con su trabajo asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Luz, 36, and her family live in a house of their own.  She has operated a farming business, growing maize and beans, for 15 years.  She sells her crop to local buyers and her earnings from the business are her means of supporting her family.  Luz is applying for a loan that she will use to buy the seeds, fertilizers and other supplies that she needs to carry on the business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in fertilizers, compost, seeds, spinach, blackberries, etc.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal “LAS PALMERAS DE AMAYBAMBA”,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Nelly tiene 47 años de edad tiene 04 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia cría a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de animales y alimentos para los mismos.
texts.en:
This group member belongs to the community bank "Las Palmeras de Amaybamba", a bank located in the province of La Convencion in the department of Cusco.

The group member, Nelly, is 47 years old, has 4 children and lives with her partner. She alternates her daily activities working in the business of raising small animals, and she's a responsible hardworking person. She raises her animals and then sells them to customers that order them, and she wants to keep working so that she can support her family. She's applying for a loan to purchase animals and feed for those animals.

loans.use: To purchase animals and feed for those animals.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
Juan, vive con sus hijos en casa propia, los cuales están estudiando, no tienen ayuda económica, todos dependen del trabajo de su padre; don Juan se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de tener su propio negocio, aprendió a trabajar en el campo de muy joven cuando le ayudaba a sus padres a realizar actividades agrícolas.
El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder pagar el alquiler del terreno en el que va a sembrar maíz y frijol, así mismo comprara insumos agrícolas para darle su debido desarrollo a sus cultivos, espera que está temporada de siembra sea de mucho beneficio para continuar trabajando y mantener su apoyo económico para cubrir los gastos de su familia.
Sus objetivos son que su negocio sea más productivo y con facilidad abastecer a su familia y a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juan lives in his own home with his children, who are in school. They do not have financial help and all depend on the work of their father. Juan works in the cultivation of corn and beans. For 15 years he has had his own business. He learned to work in the field at a young age when he used to help his parents with agricultural activities.

The loan will help Juan greatly to be able to pay the rent for the land in which he is going to grow corn and beans, as well as buy agricultural supplies to provide for the proper development of his crops. He expects that this planting season will be very beneficial to continue working and providing financial support to cover the expenses of his family. 

His goals are to make his business more productive and to be able to provide for the needs of his family and customers.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the land in which he grows corn and beans, as well as to buy agricultural supplies to provide for the proper development of his crops

loans.name: Ana Gilma

texts.es:
Ana de 28 años de edad, no sabe leer ni escribir debido a que no pudo ir a la escuela, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja realiza labores agrícolas.

Ana se dedica a vender frutas y verduras en una gasolinera, actividad que realiza desde hace muchos años y que aprendió de una amiga, en la gasolinera hay mucha afluencia de personas y por eso Ana decidió ir a vender ahí, ella debe caminar una distancia de 300 metros hasta su lugar de trabajo, además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos pues es un ingreso extra.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar más cerdos de engorde para luego venderlos o destazarlos, comprará también alimentos y vitaminas para los mismos.


Su sueño más grande es tener una vivienda agradable para su familia, darles a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar y sabe que lo puede lograr con mucho sacrificio.
texts.en:
Ana, age 28, doesn’t know how to read or write because she wasn’t able to go to school. Today, she lives with her partner, who does farm work. 

Ana sells fruit and vegetables at a gas station; work that she has been doing for many years, and that she learned from a girlfriend.  There are a lot of people coming into the gas station, so Ana decided to go there to sell. She has to walk a distance of 300 meters to get to her workplace.  In addition, she raises fattening pigs for extra income.

She is requesting this loan to purchase more fattening pigs, in order to sell them later or butcher them. She will also purchase feed and vitamins for them.

Her biggest dream is to have a nice house for her family, and to give her children the opportunity to go to school. She knows that with a lot of sacrifice, she can achieve this.

loans.use: to purchase fattening pigs to sell later or butcher, and to purchase feed and vitamins for them.

loans.name: Azucena Virtud

texts.es:
Azucena, se dedica a sembrar maíz y frijol en dos manzanas de tierra, ya cuenta con la experticia suficiente en dicho negocio, el oficio lo ha heredado de sus padres ya que ellos son agricultores y les gusta mucho trabajar en el campo; ella es casada, vive en casa de su madre y tiene una hija de 3 años de edad.
Comprará insumos agrícolas y pagara el arrendamiento de dos manzanas de tierra para cultivar maíz y frijol, espera que aumentar la productividad y calidad de sus cosechas para tener alimento para el consumo diario y para comercializar.
Sus objetivos son seguir trabajando, cancelar la deuda y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Azucena makes a living by growing corn and beans on two plots of land. She already has the expertise needed for this business. She inherited the trade from her parents, as they are farmers and really like working in the countryside.

She is married and lives in her mother's house. She has a 3-year-old daughter.

She will buy farming supplies and pay the rent on two plots of land in order to grow corn and beans. She hopes to increase the productivity and quality of her harvests, in order to have food for everyday consumption and to sell.

Her goals are to continue working, pay back the debt, and continue, with her family, ever onward.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, and to pay the rent on two plots of land to grow corn and beans

loans.name: Rosalba Vasquez

texts.es:
Rosalba de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta  1° año de bachillerato en el instituto de la ciudad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos pero solo 3 dependen de ella y se encuentran estudiando.

Rosalba trabaja cuidando niños en el centro infantil desde hace 2 años, además se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos desde pequeña pues fue lo que le enseñó su madre.


Ella necesita este crédito para comprar madera y tejas de barro para reparar el techo de su casa.

Su sueño es seguir mejorando su casa por el bienestar de sus hijos y darles buena educación.
texts.en:
Rosalba is 39 years old and went to school in her city until the first year of high school. She is a single mother of 4 children, but only 3 are her dependents, and they are in school.

For two years, Rosalba has made a living by caring for children in the daycare center. She has also worked in housekeeping since she was little, which her mother taught her.

She needs this loan to buy wood and mud tiles to repair the roof of her house.

Her dream is to continue improving her house for the well-being of her children, and to give them a good education.

loans.use: to buy wood and mud tiles to repair the roof of her house

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal “LAS PALMERAS DE AMAYBAMBA”,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Martina tiene 49 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia cría a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de animales y alimentos para los mismos.
texts.en:
This group member belongs to the community bank "Las Palmeras de Amaybamba", a bank located in the province of La Convencion in the department of Cusco. 

The group member Martina is 49 years old, has 2 children, and is separated. She alternates her daily activities working in the business of raising small animals. This group member is responsible and hardworking, raises animals and then sells them to customers that order them. She wants to continue working so that she can keep supporting her family. She's applying for a loan to purchase animals and feed for those animals.

loans.use: To purchase animals and feed for those animals.

loans.name: Lisbeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHUARA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Lizbeth; la socia continua con su  negocio de crianza de animales, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua  criando los animales como pollos y cuyes y luego los hace engordar y luego los vende en forma ambulatoria, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This group member belongs to the community bank "San Isidro de Yanahuara". The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, part of the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco. This group member is Lizbeth. She's still working in her animal raising business, and is a responsible and hardworking person. She continues to raise animals such as chicks and guinea pigs and then fattens them to sell them as a traveling vendor. This is how she gets her family ahead. The group member is applying for a loan to purchase guinea pigs, and more. She's happy about the loan and commits herself to making the payments.

loans.use: To purchase guinea pigs and more.

loans.name: Annamary

texts.en: Annamary used the previous loan to buy beers, sodas, sugar, rice and salt to sell. She is a retailer and at the same time sells fresh foods that add to her  income. She faces the challenge of low capital, which hinders expansion of her business. Besides that, she has hopes of having a bigger business. Annamary has asked for a loan to buy beers, sodas and other items to sell.

loans.use: to buy beers, sodas and other items to sell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una madre de familia de 41 años de edad es casada tiene una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre diez años y cinco meses, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Julia con el afán de obtener  sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes. Este negocio lo tiene ella desde hace  cinco años.
Julia desde hace algún tiempo junto a su esposo han empezado construir su casa pero lamentablemente ahora ellos ya no cuentan con el dinero suficiente  para terminar la construcción de la casa, por tal razón solicitan un préstamo para poder comprar materiales como cemento, arena, hierro y block.
El gran sueño de Julia es poder terminar la construcción de su casa para que sus hijos tengan mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Julia is the mother of the family. She is 41 years old and is married. She has a beautiful family, with two children who are 10 years old and five months old. This humble family lives in a community called Chichicastenango. 

Julia, with the desire to earn a living and help her husband with home expenses, works buying and selling groceries. She has had this business for five years. Some time ago, Julia, together with her husband, began to construct a house but unfortunately now they do not have sufficient funds to finish construction. For this reason they are applying for a loan to be able to buy materials like cement, stones, iron and blocks. 

Her greatest dream is to be able to finish construction of her house so that her children can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement, stone, iron and blocks

loans.name: Dilber

texts.en:
Dilber is 51 years old. She is a married mother of three kids. Dilber raises fruits and vegetables in her garden and sells them at a local bazaar. Her monthly income is 130 AZN.

People prefer to buy fruits and vegetables from private gardens because they are naturally raised and cheaper. People know that such products are always fresh and healthy; they are not grown with different pesticides and not harmful. 

During long years of experience, Dilber taught how to meet customers' demands.  Selling fruits and vegetables from houses is popular and it's cheaper for people to buy them in bazaars than in big markets.

Dilber's income doesn’t allow her to meet demands. She is planning to expand her garden and grow more seasonal fruits and vegetables. Dilber wants her sons to get a high education and have a good life. She applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN. Please support  her.

loans.use: to expand her garden and grow more seasonal fruits

loans.name: Joelle

texts.en:
Joelle is a 20-year-old single lady who is the sole breadwinner for two other members of her family. She believes that she has to work harder to provide them with the necessary living needs.

Joelle has been employed in a travel and tourism company since November 2014, and is working hard to make her dream of opening her own travel agency come true.

Today, since she is responsible for two other members of her family and because of her limited monthly salary, Joelle is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for her sister's urgent medical expenses.

loans.use: To pay for her sister's urgent medical expenses
